display_long_description:
Welcome to Planet Monkey, the ultimate VR game that lets you experience the world through the eyes of a mischievous monkey. With our highly detailed monkey model and intuitive controls, you'll feel like you're really swinging through the trees and exploring new environments.

The game features several different maps to explore, including a scary horror map, a shop where you can purchase fun cosmetic items to customize your monkey and make it truly unique, and a lot more to come soon. 

In the shop, you'll find a wide variety of items to choose from, including hats, glasses, shirts, and even we even have different fur colors. With so many options, you can create a monkey that truly reflects your personal style and stand out from the crowd.

Whether you're playing solo or competing against others, Planet Monkey offers endless hours of fun and excitement. So why wait? Join the fun today and start swinging through the trees like a true primate!
